# Tender Response Instructions
### Request for Proposal for Red Hat Openshift Platform Plus

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4642830678-Doc4643149338
* **Publication Date:** July 12, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 19, 2024, at 14:00 EST
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and other relevant trade agreements.

#### Tender Description

All respondents must submit their bids and supporting documentation by July 19, 2024, at 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Procurement Method

This procurement method is competitive and selective, with the lowest price as the selection criterion.

#### Contracting Entity

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is the contracting entity for this tender. The procurement process is managed by the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA).

#### Contact Information

For all inquiries and submissions, please contact:

Pascal Plouffe
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: [pascal.plouffe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:pascal.plouffe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Additional Information

This tender is for the provision of Red Hat Openshift Platform Plus services, with a required delivery region of the National Capital Region (NCR) in Canada. The contract will be issued based on the lowest price bid received.

Note: This notice was originally issued on a specific date and altered later for missing information the issuer also knows. Please refer to the amended bid to submit.
